channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Policy relief for family caregivers seems stalled out. But there are signs of change
item.description: Family members carry the burden and costs of caring for America's aging population. Federal policy change is slow to come but a new movement and state...

item.title: Thousands watch livestream of Maine family's food pantry for deer

item.title: Dutch angry at U.S. for yanking panels honoring Black World War II troops
item.description: The removal by a U.S. military cemetery in the Netherlands of two displays recognizing Black troops who fought in World War II has spurred anger there...

item.title: K-pop band NewJeans breaks up after bitter feud with record label
item.description: Ador says it has dropped NewJeans member Danielle Marsh while the return of Minji remains uncertain.

item.title: Why Israel's recognition of Somaliland as an independent state is controversial
item.description: Somaliland wants international recognition - here's why, and what could have driven Israel to recognise it now.

item.title: Turkey detains 357 suspected IS members in nationwide raids
item.description: The arrests come just a day after three police officers were killed during a siege in the town of Yalova.

item.title: French right pushes for national tribute to film star Brigitte Bardot
item.description: A petition for a national homage to Brigitte Bardot - who died on Sunday - attracts more than 23,000 signatures.

item.title: Ukraine denies drone attack on Putin's residence
item.description: Russia has accused Ukraine of targeting a presidential residence, which President Zelensky called "typical Russian lies".

item.title: Winter storm packing snow and strong winds to descend on Great Lakes and Northeast
item.description: A wild winter storm is bringing strong winds, heavy snow and frigid temperatures to the Great Lakes and Northeast.

item.title: George Clooney, his wife and their twins granted French citizenship
item.description: France's government says that George Clooney, his wife Amal and their eight-year-old twins Ella and Alexander have been awarded French citizenship.

item.title: "Bomb cyclone" hits Midwest, takes aim at East Coast. Maps show forecast.
item.description: A powerful winter storm system moving across the Great Lakes and Northeast is bringing snow and ice, frigid temperatures and fierce wind gusts.
